languages.text: {n}Вы бросаете взгляд на лодку. Ксеносская посудина выглядит абсолютно чуждо. Вы смутно представляете назначение тех или иных элементов конструкции, но о том, для чего нужны остальные, даже думать не хочется. Вам нужен пилот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы бросаете взгляд на лодку. Ксеносская посудина выглядит абсолютно чуждо. Вы смутно представляете назначение тех или иных элементов конструкции, но о том, для чего нужны остальные, вы даже думать не хотите. Вам нужен пилот.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы бросаете взгляд на лодку. Ксеносская посудина выглядит абсолютно чуждо. Вы смутно представляете назначение тех или иных элементов конструкции, но о том, для чего нужны остальные, даже думать не хочется. Вам нужен пилот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do, but you do not even want to think about the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

{n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to start to think about the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

{n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to start to think about the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

{n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

{n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous jetez un coup d'œil au vaisseau xénos. Vous n'avez aucune idée de son fonctionnement. Vous avez une vague notion du rôle de certains éléments, mais le reste vous laisse totalement {mf|démuni|démunie} et vous préférez ne pas chercher à deviner son utilité. Vous allez devoir faire appel à quelqu'un capable de piloter ce vaisseau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous jetez un coup d'œil au vaisseau xénos. Vous n'avez aucune idée de son fonctionnement. Vous avez une vague notion du rôle de certains éléments, mais le reste vous laisse totalement {mf|démuni|démunie} et vous n'avez pas la moindre idée de son utilité. Vous allez devoir faire appel à quelqu'un capable de diriger ce vaisseau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你看了一眼异形的飞船。飞船的整体设计非常陌生，尽管其中某些部分你大概猜到可能是用来最什么的，但剩下的部分根本无从猜想。你需要一位飞行员才能把它开走。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你看了一眼异形的飞船。飞船的整体设计非常陌生，尽管其中某些部分你大概猜到可能是用来最什么的，但剩下的部分根本无从猜想。你需要一位飞行员才能把它开走。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは異種族の船をちらりと見た。そのデザインは、まったく異質なものに見える。いくつかのパーツの役割は漠然とわかるが、残りのパーツの設計意図については想像もしたくない。ともかく操舵手が必要だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは異種族の船をちらりと見た。そのデザインは、まったく異質なものに見える。いくつかのパーツの役割は漠然とわかるが、残りのパーツの設計意図については想像もしたくない。ともかく操舵手が必要だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du nimmst das Xenos-Boot in den Blick. Das Design kommt dir völlig fremd vor. Du bekommst eine vage Vorstellung davon, welchen Zweck einige Teile haben, was den Rest betrifft – darüber willst du dir gar nicht erst Gedanken machen. Du brauchst einen Piloten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du nimmst das Xenos-Boot in den Blick. Das Design kommt dir völlig fremd vor. Du bekommst eine vage Vorstellung davon, welchen Zweck manche der Teile haben, was aber den Rest betrifft – darüber willst du dir gar nicht erst Gedanken machen. Du brauchst einen Piloten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Echas un vistazo a la embarcación xenos. El diseño te resulta completamente ajeno. Tienes una vaga idea del propósito de algunos componentes, pero no quieres ni intentar adivinar para qué servirán los demás. Necesitas un piloto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Echas un vistazo a la embarcación xenos. El diseño te resulta completamente ajeno. Tienes una vaga idea del propósito de algunos componentes, pero no quieres ni pensar para qué servirán los demás. Necesitas un piloto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zeno gemisine göz gezdiriyorsun. Tasarımı sana tamamen yabancı duruyor. Bazı parçalarının ne işe yaradığı hakkında belli belirsiz bir fikre sahip olsan da geriye kalanın ne amaca hizmet ettiği konusunda tahminde bile bulunmak istemiyorsun. Sana bir pilot lazım.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You take a glance at the xenos boat. The design looks utterly foreign to you. You have a vague idea what some of its parts might do but you do not even want to attempt to guess at the intended purpose of the rest. You need a pilot.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno gemisine göz gezdiriyorsun. Tasarımı sana tamamen yabancı duruyor. Bazı parçalarının ne işe yaradığı hakkında belli belirsiz bir fikre sahip olsan da geriye kalanın ne amaca hizmet ettiği konusunda tahminde bile bulunmak istemiyorsun. Sana bir pilot lazım.{/n}
